criteria.name: Communication
expectations: Limits interruptions while others are communicating
Appropriately responds to direction, coaching, or criticism
Expresses ideas clearly and in an organized way
Communicates in a positive, timely, and effective manner

criteria.name: Flexibility
expectations: Adjusts work methods to meet new needs
Willing to learn and apply new methods

criteria.name: Initiative
expectations: Identifies and addresses issues before they escalate

criteria.name: Quality of Work
expectations: Delivers work that meets or exceeds expectations
Reviews work for completeness and correctness
Continuously seeks to improve work quality
